DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate if there is an association between platelet inhibition and surgery-related bleeding in patients undergoing non-cardiac surgery during dual antiplatelet therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Inhibition and Bleeding in Patients Undergoing Non-Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: intake of Clopidogrel, Prasugrel, or Ticagrelor within the last 7 days spontaneous bleeding or impeding surgery (major vascular surgery, intraperitoneal or intrathoracic surgery, ENTsurgery, orthopedic or trauma surgery, prostatic surgery) concomitant medication with warfarin renal insufficiency needing dialysis concomitant therapy with GPIIB/IIIA Antagonists expected duration of operation >30min
